**/bin/**
**/*.exe
**/build/**
**/dist/**
**/vendor/**

# IDE and editor files
**/.idea/**
**/.vscode/**
**/.vs/**
**/*.swp
**/*.swo

# Temporary and cache files
**/tmp/**
**/*.tmp
**/*.temp
**/*.cache

# Test files
**/*.test
**/*.out
**/coverage.*
**/.coverage

# Environment and sensitive files
**/.env
**/.env.*
**/config/local.*
**/secrets/**
**/*.pem
**/*.key

# OS generated files
**/.DS_Store
**/.DS_Store?
**/._*
**/.Spotlight-V100
**/.Trashes
**/ehthumbs.db
**/Thumbs.db

# Log files
**/*.log
**/logs/**
